location.sjis: ルイーズ村 牢屋前

portrait_l.name: gatekeeper
portrait_l.sjis: ギャラハンさんの奥さん 若くて、キレイだったよな 娘ほど年の離れた奥さんもらって
portrait_l.ascii: Mr. Gallahan's wife was young and beautiful Young enough to be his daughter.

portrait_l.name: gatekeeper
portrait_l.sjis: 村中から冷やかされてたけど あんな事になるなんて
portrait_l.ascii: That didn't sit well with the villagers, but who knew it would come to this

portrait_l.name: child
portrait_l.sjis: ギャラハンさんは怒ると怖いけど とてもやさしいんだよ
portrait_l.ascii: Mr. Gallahan is scary when he's mad, but he's normally very kind.

portrait_l.name: child
portrait_l.sjis: でも時々、ボクを見ながら すごく、寂しそうな顔をするんだよ
portrait_l.ascii: But sometimes, I notice him looking at me with a very lonely face.
